title: Dead Reckoning
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=
A politician kidnapped, a gang on the run. A lone necromancer left picking up the pieces. Quinn Law in: DEAD RECKONING.
]]
=====


[[include :scp-wiki:theme:ui]]

[[module CSS]]
#header h2 span::before {
    content: 'Unusual Incidents Unit';
}
.uiu-header-box {
   border: solid 5px #999999;
   background:#eef0f2;
   padding: 10px;
   margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.uiu-header-box a.collapsible-block-link{
   font-size: 2em;
   font-weight: bold;
}
.uiu-file-box {
   border: solid 2px #000000;
   background: #eef0f2;
   padding: 10px;
   margin-bottom: 10px;
   overflow-x: auto;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav {
    border: solid #999999;
    border-width: 5px 5px 0px 5px;
    background: #999999;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav li {
    margin: 0px 2px 0px 0px;
    padding: 0px;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected {
    margin: 0px 2px 0px 0px;
    padding: 0px;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav li em {
    font-family: courier, monospace !important;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.yui-navset .yui-content {
    background: #eef0f2;
    border: solid 2px #000000;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a em {
    padding: 0px 5px 0px 5px;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a em {
    padding: 0px 5px 0px 5px;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a,
div.yui-navset div.yui-navset-top ul.yui-nav a {
    background: #f4eede;
    border: solid #000000;
    border-width: 3px 3px 1px 3px;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:hover,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:focus {
    background: #bfc3d4;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:focus,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:hover {
    background: #0a0037;
    border: solid 3px #ffffff;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  #header h1 a::before {
        content: "FBI ";
        font-size: 6vw;
        padding-inline-start: 55px;
    }
 
    #header h2 span::before {
        content: 'UIU';
        padding-inline-start: 55px;
    }
 }
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Anorrack]]
**SCP-7890**
**Author:** [[*user Anorrack]]

[[[http://www.scpwiki.com/anorrack-s-author-page|Author Page]]]

**Articles you may enjoy:**

**[[[pullingyourstrings | Pulling Your Strings]]]:** A man takes the night shift at the morgue on Halloween night. But what is that tapping, that inconstant, arrhythmic tapping, coming from deeper inside the building?

**[[[SCP-7890|SCP-7890]]]- M.T.F. S.O.L., S.N.A.F.U.:** How do you fight a cartel that bends Lady Luck to its will? Fight fire with fire, and bring your own anomalies out to play.

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/point-of-delirium Point of Delirium]:** A member of a criminal organization has been captured by the Foundation. Will he give up his secrets, or will he hold fast until he crumples into insanity?

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/walkin-slow Don't Go Walking Slow]:** A British offensive gone wrong, stranded behind enemy lines. What could be hidden underneath the topsoil of the Burmese jungle?

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

[[hcell style="text-align:left; vertical-align:top"]]
**Summary**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
Following an incident wherein a Floridian politician was kidnapped by an occult criminal syndicate, an investigation has been opened on the motive and actors involved. 

Tracing a path of magical heists and sorcerous homicides, federal necromancer Quinn Law must face old foes, meet new allies, and figure out the mafia's endgame before it's too late. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]

[[div style="border: solid 5px #999999; background:#eef0f2; padding: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[tabview]]
[[tab Incident 27-051]]

**[[[dead-men-tell-tales | Dead Men Tell Tales]]]** — A corpse doesn't easy reveal its secrets, unless you're a necromancer. Good thing Agent Quinn law specializes in necromantic forensics.

[[module ListPages name="dead-men-tell-tales" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]]
 (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments)
[[/module]]

[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
@@ @@

[[tabview]]
[[tab Incident 22-053]]

**[[[dead-mans-hand |Dead Man's Hand]]]** — The hand that western lawman Wild Bill had when he was killed over a game of poker, consisting of two pairs of black aces and black eights. Considered bad luck by the superstitious, and a portent of things to come. Will Quinn Law shake off her bad luck, or we she stumble into something worse? 

[[module ListPages name="dead-mans-hand" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]]
 (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments)
[[/module]]
[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
@@ @@


[[tabview]]
[[tab Incident 21-054]]

**[[[dead-mans-switch  |Dead Man's Switch]]]** — A type of switch that only activates once the user is killed, incapacitated, or knocked unconscious. Useful for bombs, traps, or for when a UIU agent wakes up something that shouldn't have been touched.

[[module ListPages name="dead-mans-switch" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]]
 (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments)
[[/module]]

[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
@@ @@
[[tabview]]
[[tab Incident 21-055]]

**[[[dead-mans-secrets  |Dead Man's Secrets]]]** — Two men can keep a secret, if one of them is dead. What is hidden in this secret government facility? Why did Jenny come here? What mysteries will Quinn Law uncover? 

[[module ListPages name="dead-mans-secrets" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]]
 (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments)
[[/module]]

[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
@@ @@

[[tabview]]
[[tab Incident 21-055A]]

**[[[digging-two-graves  | Digging Two Graves]]]** — A “brief” interstitial where a necromancer and a corpse talk about death. 

[[module ListPages name="digging-two-graves" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]]
 (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments)
[[/module]]

[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
@@ @@

[[tabview]]
[[tab Incident 38-058 (see After-Action Report 2014-049-Kappa)]]

**[[[dead-man-walking |Dead Man Walking]]]** — A phrase used for people exposed to nuclear radiation, reanimated corpses, or for Eight-Legged Jenny, as Agent Law finally catches up to the Lighthouse Mafia. Will the UIU be able to stop Jenny from enacting the final part of her secret plan?

[[module ListPages name="dead-man-walking" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]]
 (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments)
[[/module]]
[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[tabview]]
[[tab Appending Documents]]
**Credits:** Thank you to all of the critters who made this tale series possible, and also not a disaster to read. Thanks especially to [[*user Tsercele]], [[*user Jacob Conwell]], [[*user Ralliston]], and [[*user A Random Day]] for critting my works and helping to shape my voice, and especially thanks to [[*user GreenWolf]], for crafting Quinn Law and gifting her off to me. I loved writing for the Third Law canon, and I love its fusion of magitech and balls-to-the-wall action. I hope I did it justice. This is my first series, but I hope it’s just the beginning.

**Inspiration:** Major inspiration for the series is taken from the Laundry Files by Charles Stross, the Dresden Files by Jim Butcher, and maybe a little bit of Hellboy by Mike Mignola. All amazing series about magic in the real world, and how the people in the middle try to deal with it. Would heartily recommend all of the books/issues/trades/omnibuses. 
[[/tab]]
